title: Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 289 of 2015) is amended, in paragraph (5), by the
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Bank
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Bank 

Recovery and Resolution) (Amendment) Regulations 2024.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (bank recovery resolution) (amendment) regulation 2024

title: Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 289 of 2015) is amended, in paragraph (5), by the
heading: 2. Regulation 80J of the European Union (Bank Recovery and Resolution)
text_raw:
2. Regulation 80J of the European Union (Bank Recovery and Resolution) 
Regulations 2015 (S.I. No. 289 of 2015) is amended, in paragraph (5), by the 
substitution of the following subparagraph for subparagraph (a): 

“(a) 

the adjustment may be applied in respect of differences in the 
calculation of the total risk exposure amounts between the 
relevant Member States or third countries by adjusting the level 
of the requirement;”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

9 April, 2024. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

1 OJ No. L 173, 12.06.2014, p.190 
2 OJ No. L 150, 07.06.2019, p.296 
3 OJ No. L 275, 25.10.2022, p.1 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 12th April, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [139] 3
